article: Dear Mingming, Hi, I'm writing to you in Rizhao. I'm on vacation  _  my parents here. Rinzhao is very beautiful and  there are  lots of beaches. It's  _  today.People are having a good  _  on the beaches. Some are playing beach volleyball, some are enjoying the sunlight, and  _  are playing games.  _  are my parents? Oh, my  _  is lying on the beach, and my mother is  _  in the sea . I'm  _  I have to stop here. My mother wants me to  _  photos for her. I hope you and Lingling are having fun, too.
